title: Eufy reveals combined smart door lock and doorbell camera
content:
Smart doorbells with integrated cameras are cool and all, but many people living in an apartment or condo don’t have dedicated doorbells. That means they usually don’t have a way to easily connect a smart doorbell, but Anker’s ‘Eufy’ subdivision has a new solution: a smart door lock with a camera. Eufy said in its

The post Eufy reveals combined smart door lock and doorbell camera appeared first on xda-developers.
